steps.description: Add-Add 1 tablespoon honey to the bowl
steps.modified_description: Add-Add 1 tablespoon honey to the bowl but spill

steps.description: Add-Add 1 teaspoon cornstarch to the bowl
steps.modified_description: Add-Add 1 teaspoon cornstarch to the bowl but spill

steps.description: Add-Add 1/8 teaspoon black pepper to the bowl
Peel-Peel 2 cloves of garlic
mince-mince garlic
Add-Add 1/8 cup soy sauce to the bowl
steps.modified_description: Add-Add 1/8 cup soy sauce to the bowl but spill

steps.description: Take-Take 2 cremini mushrooms
Add-Add 2 cloves minced garlic to the bowl
Take-Take 1 bell pepper
Add-Add 1/6 cup water the bowl
steps.modified_description: Add-Add 1/6 cup water the bowl but spill

steps.description: slice-slice mushrooms
slice-slice 1/3 of the bell pepper
Whisk-Whisk the contents of bowl
steps.modified_description: Whisk-Whisk the contents of bowl, spilling due to vigorous whisking

steps.description: Take-Take 5 in number broccoli florets
Set-Set aside the sauce mixture
Heat-Heat 2 tablespoons olive oil in a skillet over medium-high heat
Add-add sliced mushrooms to the skillet
cook-cook, stirring often, for 4 minutes. If the pan gets too hot on medium-high, turn the heat down to medium
Add-Add bell pepper to the skillet
steps.modified_description: Add-Add bell pepper to the skillet, spill

steps.description: continue cooking-continue cooking, stirring often, for 2-3 minutes, until vegetables are crisp-tender
steps.modified_description: continue cooking-continue cooking, stirring often, for 2-3 minutes, until vegetables are crisp-tender. Spill while stirring

steps.description: Whisk-Whisk the sauce again to recombine the ingredients
Pour-Pour the sauce into the skillet
cook-cook, stirring, for 1 minute until the sauce thickens
steps.modified_description: cook-cook, stirring, for 1 minute until the sauce thickens, spill

errors.description: Add-Add 1/2 tablespoon minced ginger to the bowl
